      • isValidClassMethod

        private static boolean isValidClassMethod(char c)
        Parameters:
        c - the character.
        Returns:
        true if the character is valid in a class method, false otherwise.

      • getClassMethod

        public static Friend.FriendClassMethod getClassMethod(java.lang.String classMethod)
        Parses the given class method and returns an object which contains the class and the method. An example of input would be org.ardenus.Friend.Validator.getClassMethod(java.lang.String). If you want to use a constructor as a friend, simply use a "^" before the parameters. An example of this would be java.lang.String^().
        Parameters:
        classMethod - the class method.
        Returns:
        the class and the method.
